Text:
Hopefully a few people will check out where they got the name from (the 1984 release by the legendary UK band Coil) as Coil deserve the widest attention possible....one of the most important bands of the last thirty years in my not so humble opinion.

Interesting music from Trent & Co. thanks for sharing it in a good quality rip.
already have these at this quality. but great up! i cant wait for the full ep!

full multitrack files available make your own remixes.
